About the Company: Punjab Communications Ltd is India`s premier Telecom and IT equipment and solution provider company having successfully supplied and implemented a host of state-of-the-art Telecom, Software and integrated turnkey solutions across the country.The products and services offered by the company includes: Product-Transmission Products,Radio Products,Switching Products,Networking Products and Security & Surveillance.Services-Turnkey projects,Internet Services and Contract manufacturing.IT Solution-Software,Consultancy,Design Services and BPO..The company also engagged in the business of Interest Income, Sales, Services & Other Income, Others (Interest & Rental Income).
